  • Method Details

    • transferGroceryItemsToFridge

      void transferGroceryItemsToFridge(Long shoppinglistId, Long fridgeId, Set<GroceryItemDto> groceryItems)
      Transfers one or more GroceryItems from a Shoppinglist to a Fridge.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - A Long representing the ID of the Shoppinglist to transfer the GroceryItems from.
      fridgeId - A Long representing the ID of the Fridge to transfer the GroceryItems to.
      groceryItems - A set of grocery items representing to be transferred.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Shoppinglist, Fridge, or GroceryItem with the given ID does not exist in the database.
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if an error occurs while accessing the database.
      org.hibernate.HibernateException - if an error occurs while Hibernate is executing a query or interacting with the database.
      Exception - if an unknown exception occurs.

    • addGroceryItemsToShoppinglist

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<GroceryItemDto>> addGroceryItemsToShoppinglist(Long shoppinglistId, Set<GroceryItemDto> groceryItems)
      Adds one or more GroceryItems to a Shoppinglist and returns a ResponseEntity containing a Set of the added GroceryItemDtos.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - A Long representing the ID of the Shoppinglist to add the GroceryItems to.
      groceryItems - A Set of GroceryItemDtos representing the GroceryItems to add to the Shoppinglist.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a Set of the added GroceryItemDtos and a status code indicating the success of the operation.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Shoppinglist or GroceryItem with the given ID does not exist in the database.

    • getAllGroceryItemsInShoppinglist

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<GroceryItemShoppinglistDto>> getAllGroceryItemsInShoppinglist(Long shoppinglistId)
      Retrieves all grocery items in a shopping list and returns them as a set of GroceryItemShoppinglistDto objects.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - the ID of the shopping list to retrieve grocery items from
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Set> containing the set of GroceryItemShoppinglistDto objects and a HTTP status code indicating success or failure of the operation
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the shopping list with the given ID is not found in the database

    • getGroceryItemsByIdInShoppinglist

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemShoppinglistDto> getGroceryItemsByIdInShoppinglist(Long shoppinglistId, Long groceryItemId)
      This method retrieves a GroceryItemShoppinglistDto object for a given grocery item id and shopping list id.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - The id of the shopping list to search in.
      groceryItemId - The id of the grocery item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a GroceryItemShoppinglistDto object if the grocery item is found in the shopping list, or a NOT_FOUND HttpStatus if the item or list is not found.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the grocery item with the given id is not found in the shopping list.

    • deleteAllGroceryItemsInShoppinglist

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteAllGroceryItemsInShoppinglist(Long shoppinglistId)
      Deletes all grocery items from the shopping list with the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - the ID of the shopping list to delete grocery items from
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a status code of NO_CONTENT if the operation was successful, or a status code of NOT_FOUND if the shopping list with the provided ID was not found
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the shopping list with the provided ID was not found

    • removeGroceryItemsFromShoppinglist

      void removeGroceryItemsFromShoppinglist(Long shoppinglistId, Set<GroceryItemDto> groceryItems)
      Removes a grocery item from a shopping list.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - the ID of the shopping list to remove the grocery item from
      groceryItems - the grocery items to be removed
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the grocery item with the given ID is not found

    • updateGroceryItemInShoppinglist

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemDto> updateGroceryItemInShoppinglist(Long shoppinglistId, GroceryItemDto groceryItemDto)
      Updates a grocery item in a shopping list with the given id. Replaces the amount of the grocery item with the given amount, removes the grocery item from the list with the given timestamp, and adds the grocery item back to the list with the updated amount. If an actual shelf life is not provided or is 0, sets the actual shelf life to the expected shelf life of the grocery item. Saves the updated shopping list to the database and returns the updated grocery item as a GroceryItemDto object in a ResponseEntity with OK status.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - the id of the shopping list containing the grocery item to update
      groceryItemDto - the GroceryItemDto object containing the updated information for the grocery item
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the updated GroceryItemDto object and OK status if the update is successful
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the grocery item or shopping list with the given ids are not found

    • addGroceryItemsToFridge

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<GroceryItemDto>> addGroceryItemsToFridge(Long fridgeId, Set<GroceryItemDto> groceryItems)
      Adds a set of grocery items to the fridge with the given fridgeId.
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - the ID of the fridge to add the grocery items to
      groceryItems - the set of GroceryItemDto objects to be added to the fridge
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a Set of GroceryItemDto objects that were successfully added to the fridge with the given fridgeId, along with a HttpStatus.OK status code, or a ResponseEntity with a HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND status code if either the fridge with the given fridgeId or a grocery item with one of the IDs in the set of groceryItems was not found

    • getAllGroceryItemsInFridge

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<GroceryItemFridgeDto>> getAllGroceryItemsInFridge(Long fridgeId)
      Retrieve all grocery items in the specified fridge.
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - ID of the fridge to retrieve grocery items from.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing a Set of GroceryItemFridgeDto objects, representing the grocery items in the fridge.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the fridge with the specified ID is not found.

    • getGroceryItemsByIdInFridge

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemFridgeDto> getGroceryItemsByIdInFridge(Long fridgeId, Long groceryItemId)
      Retrieves a grocery item by its ID from a specific fridge.
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - The ID of the fridge to search in.
      groceryItemId - The ID of the grocery item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a GroceryItemFridgeDto object if the grocery item is found in the fridge.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the fridge or grocery item is not found.

    • deleteAllGroceryItemsInFridge

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteAllGroceryItemsInFridge(Long fridgeId)
      Deletes all grocery items in a fridge with a given id.
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - the id of the fridge whose grocery items are to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the HTTP status code NO_CONTENT if the operation was successful, or NOT_FOUND if the fridge with the given id was not found
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the fridge with the given id is not found

    • removeGroceryItemFromFridge

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FridgeDto> removeGroceryItemFromFridge(Long fridgeId, GroceryItemDto groceryItemDto)
      Removes the given grocery item from the fridge with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - the ID of the fridge from which the grocery item should be removed
      groceryItemDto - the grocery item to be removed
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated FridgeDto object and an HTTP status code
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if either the fridge or the grocery item cannot be found

    • updateGroceryItemInFridge

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemDto> updateGroceryItemInFridge(Long fridgeId, GroceryItemDto groceryItemDto)
      Updates a grocery item in the fridge with the given fridgeId and GroceryItemDto .
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - the ID of the fridge to update the grocery item in
      groceryItemDto - the DTO containing the updated grocery item information
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the updated GroceryItemDto and HTTP status OK, or HTTP status NOT_FOUND if either the grocery item or fridge could not be found

    • getAllGroceryItems

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<GroceryItemDto>> getAllGroceryItems()
      Returns a ResponseEntity with a Set of all GroceryItemDto objects in the database.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a Set of all GroceryItemDto objects. If there are no grocery items in the database, returns a ResponseEntity with HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT.

    • getGroceryItemById

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemDto> getGroceryItemById(Long groceryItemId)
      Retrieves a GroceryItem by its ID.
      Parameters:
      groceryItemId - the ID of the GroceryItem to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the retrieved GroceryItemDto and HTTP status code 200 OK if successful, or HTTP status code 404 NOT FOUND if the GroceryItem with the specified ID cannot be found.

    • updateGroceryItem

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemDto> updateGroceryItem(Long groceryItemId, GroceryItemDto updatedGroceryItemDto)
      Update an existing grocery item in the database with the given ID using the provided updated grocery item DTO.
      Parameters:
      groceryItemId - the ID of the grocery item to be updated
      updatedGroceryItemDto - the DTO representing the updated grocery item data
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity object with HTTP status code 200 if the update was successful
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the grocery item with the given ID does not exist in the database

    • deleteGroceryItem

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemDto> deleteGroceryItem(Long groceryItemId)
      Deletes a Grocery Item from the database by the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      groceryItemId - the ID of the Grocery Item to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with HTTP status code OK if the Grocery Item is deleted successfully, or with HTTP status code NOT_FOUND if the Grocery Item with the provided ID is not found
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Grocery Item with the provided ID is not found

    • removeGroceryItemsFromFridge

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> removeGroceryItemsFromFridge(Long fridgeId, List<IngredientDTO> ingredients)
      Removes a list of ingredients from a fridge, identified by the fridgeId. The amount to remove for each ingredient is determined by the amount specified in the IngredientDTO object. Calls the removeAmountFromFridge method for each ingredient to perform the actual removal.
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - the id of the fridge from which to remove the ingredients
      ingredients - a list of IngredientDTO objects containing the id and amount of each ingredient to remove
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with NO_CONTENT status if the removal is successful
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the fridge with the given id is not found
